channel.title: Shopping Space ? Help
channel.description:
Well im using Hybridscape, just messing around, and im playing on a server by my self. the built in one
I was wondering...how do i make the space in a shop have more room, i am having problems
heres an example...
I type in item ID and ammount of the item in the shops.cfg file, and ill add about 5 "Extra" items with the amount.
Heres an example on how the codes look when it works
[code]shop = 10 Horvik's_Armor_shop 2 2 1149 2000 1187 2000 3140 2000 4087 2000 4585 2000 4719 2000 4151 2000 1052 2000 [/code]
but heres how i want it to look
[code]shop = 10 Horvik's_Armor_shop 2 2 1149 2000 1187 2000 3140 2000 4087 2000 4585 2000 4719 2000 4151 2000 1052 2000 ITEMID AMOUNT ITEMID AMOUNT[/code]
Yet when i try to add more items to the shop, i get connection lost, but if i make it how it should be, it connects me fine. How would i make more space in the shop, without losing connection each time, I will pay 100k Real RS Cash for help :)
thats if your help worked[br][size=1]Posted at: August 10, 2006, 04:38:48 AM[/size][hr]Ok now i will pay 500k for help :P
I will give the money first, but i dont know if i can trust some people :rolleyes:

item.title: Shopping Space ? Help
item.dc:creator: @cutter cutter
item.description:
@cutter wrote:

its because when you add something to a shop u cant use the space bar, u have to use the tab key

Read full topic

item.title: Shopping Space ? Help
item.dc:creator: @Slyte Slyte
item.description:
@Slyte wrote:

Well im using Hybridscape, just messing around, and im playing on a server by my self. the built in one

I was wondering…how do i make the space in a shop have more room, i am having problems

heres an example…

I type in item ID and ammount of the item in the shops.cfg file, and ill add about 5 “Extra” items with the amount.

Heres an example on how the codes look when it works

shop = 10	Horvik's_Armor_shop				2	2	1149	2000	1187	2000	3140	2000	4087	2000	4585	2000	4719	2000	4151	2000	1052	2000

but heres how i want it to look

shop = 10	Horvik's_Armor_shop				2	2	1149	2000	1187	2000	3140	2000	4087	2000	4585	2000	4719	2000	4151	2000	1052	2000    ITEMID  AMOUNT  ITEMID  AMOUNT

Yet when i try to add more items to the shop, i get connection lost, but if i make it how it should be, it connects me fine.
How would i make more space in the shop, without losing connection each time, I will pay 100k Real RS Cash for help

thats if your help worked[br][size=1]Posted at: August 10, 2006, 04:38:48 AM[/size][hr]Ok now i will pay 500k for help

I will give the money first, but i dont know if i can trust some people :rolleyes:
